alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bannock and east central Power Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 328 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Hall Bannock Creek Lodge, or 11 miles southwest of Pocatello, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Pocatello, Chubbuck, Fort Hall Bannock Creek Lodge and Pocatello Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
